overview: In this gospel concert recorded live in 1999, the Grammy-nominated Williams Brothers take their musical ministry to Jackson, Miss., inspiring fans with "Don't Leave Me," "Still Standing Tall," "Waitin' on Jesus" and other stirring hits. Joining the trio for this praise celebration are Bishop Carlton Pearson, prophetess Juanita Bynum and K & K Mime.
title: The Williams Brothers: The Concert
